head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSS, BRINK, ANNETTE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSS, BRINK, ANNETTE

block.p: ROSS-BRINK-Annette, formerly of Manhasset, NY & Delray Beach, FL, passed away on June 6th, 2000. Pre-deceased by Alfred J. Ross and Frederick Brink. Loving mother of Richard (Anne), Alfred (Deirdre), Peter (Barbara), David, MaryLouise Irvine (Pat) and Donald (Katherine) and 16 grandchildren and 9 great-grandchildren. In repose at The Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd., Manhasset on Thursday Evening from 6-9pm. Funeral Mass on Friday 9:45am at St. Mary's RC Church, with interment to follow in Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury, NY
